nodes.text: Xantar was a planet located within the Xantar system of the Outer Rim Territories. Located in the Corva sector, it included green forests, and was the homeworld of a gray-skinned sentient species. Luke Skywalker visited the world as the guest of a native pilot, and met another human visitor, Indiana Jones.

The appearance of the alien and Luke Skywalker's trip to his planet at the end of Star Wars: Yoda Stories is a reference to the end of an earlier game of similar design, Indiana Jones and his Desktop Adventures. At the end of that game, Indiana Jones is visited by the alien and taken onboard his spaceship.
